mapper.insert: insert into member(loginId, password, nickname) values (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where loginId = #{loginId}
select count(*) from member where loginId = #{loginId} and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into board (boardNum, title, content, memberNum, date, category, startDate) VALUES (#{boardNum},#{title},#{content},#{memberNum},#{date},#{category},#{startDate})
mapper.select: select * from board where boardNum order by boardNum desc;
mapper.update: update board set title =#{title},content =#{content}, dateTime = NOW(), category=#{category}, startDate={startDate} where boardNum=#{boardNum}
